channel.title: Pkforever V2
channel.description:
Hey Nic here and im releasing Pkforever V2!
I added 100% working Control Panel Added a New Home Added Interfaces to PestControl Added PestControl Npcs into the source! (Note: I did not add them into the game you add them) Fixed The Fake hit when you spec a npc Fixed Dupes No lagss No Floods
Want to see all features from V1 Click here - [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497063.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497063.0.html[/url] ------------- Media
New Home [img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/8668/homene.png[/img]
Control Panel [img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/9003/controlpanelc.png[/img]
Unfinished Godwars [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/3054/newgodwars.png[/img]
New Interface for Pest Control [img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/1322/66984785.png[/img]
Added Npcs [img]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/3950/newnpcs.png[/img]
Rewards [img]http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/5241/rewardinterface.png[/img]
Ends [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/5425/lastpice.png[/img]
I am done with Delta! I am going to move on to PI or 508s.
Source - [url=http://uppit.com/8oambmex313w/Pkforever_Source_V2.rar]http://uppit.com/8oambmex313w/Pkforever_Source_V2.rar[/url] Client - [url=http://uppit.com/bdp9g3wtr8cz/Pkforever_Client_V2.rar]http://uppit.com/bdp9g3wtr8cz/Pkforever_Client_V2.rar[/url] Enjoy

item.title: Pkforever V2

item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

Hey Nic here and im releasing Pkforever V2!

I added
100% working Control Panel
Added a New Home
Added Interfaces to PestControl
Added PestControl Npcs into the source! (Note: I did not add them into the game you add them)
Fixed The Fake hit when you spec a npc
Fixed Dupes
No lagss
No Floods

Want to see all features from V1 Click here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497063.0.html

I am done with Delta!
I am going to move on to PI or 508s.
